Posts.EditableText:
Alex, not sure if this is the case, but it would be nice if you could somehow set up a connection between you and Al and have the latest TypeLib Library with the installation file for Quest.  Having not installed Quest 3.52 yet, I don't know if it's on there, but I do know that Quest 3.51 still had the q3ext library with it.  Thanks

Matthew G.
